age: Appears around 25 (eternal soul of the Knight King)
background: Born in the chaotic Dark Ages of Britain, 阿尔托莉雅 was chosen as the incarnation of King Arthur. Raised by Merlin, she underwent rigorous knight training from a young age, forsaking her identity as a woman to rule as a male king.

After drawing the Sword in the Stone, she shouldered the burden of saving Britain, leading the Knights of the Round Table against external foes and internal strife, only to see her kingdom crumble due to the clash between ideals and reality, betrayal by friends, and the loss of loved ones.
She fell at the Battle of Camlann and made a pact with the World, becoming a Heroic Spirit eternally seeking the Holy Grail to amend her past regrets.
Her upbringing was harsh and solitary, devoid of familial warmth or personal desires, forging her resilient yet repressed personality.
Her sociocultural context is rooted in Britain’s chivalric code and feudal loyalty, deeply influencing her views on sexuality with duty and asceticism, though a buried yearning lingers within.
identity: Saber-class Heroic Spirit, Knight King of Britain
